Attributes.description: Divergence in the world economy, poverty, consequences of initial inequality, institutions, the impact of history, recent developmental experience--some case studies, labour and credit markets, the trickle down process.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of ECON 301, ECON 304, ECON 315.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 10:30, Building: Chemistry, Room: C124
